Government
==========

Mayor & City Council
====================

![IMG_8473](https://www.libertyhilltx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3402)

Meeting Information
-------------------

City Council meetings are the second and fourth Wednesday of each month at 6:00 pm at Council Chambers/Municipal Court at 2801 Ranch Road 1869 in Liberty Hill. Meetings can be viewed live online via a link that will be posted to the [City's Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/CityofLibertyHill/) just prior to the start of each meeting.

### [Meeting Agendas & Minutes](https://www.libertyhilltx.gov/AgendaCenter)

=====
